Ruler of Life and Death.name: Ruler of Life and Death
Ruler of Life and Death.flavor: You display your destined right to rule by forcing an attacking enemy to bow before your majesty.
Ruler of Life and Death.trigger: A nonminion enemy within 10 squares of you drops to 0 hit points
Ruler of Life and Death.effect: The target heals 1 hit point and gains temporary hit points equal to 30 + your Charisma score. It is also dominated (save ends). Each time the target fails a saving throw against this effect, it gains 30 temporary hit points.
Ruler of Life and Death.aftereffect: The target loses all temporary hit points and drops to 0 hit points.
